id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-community-teen participates in community planning and decision-making
title: Teen participates in community planning and decision-making
description: Teen participates in community planning and decision-making
content:
Scenario: Teen participates in community planning and decision-making
    Given the community is planning a new youth recreation facility
    And Jasmine has relevant knowledge as a current user of community spaces
    When the community_elohim facilitates community input
    Then Jasmine's voice should be actively solicited
    And her input should carry weight in planning decisions
    And her care contributions should give her standing in the conversation
    And community planners should engage her as a legitimate stakeholder
    And she should learn that civic participation is her right and responsibility
    And youth voice should shape systems designed for collective flourishing
